**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Raptor Guard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2128) **Source** [Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands](/Sources.aspx?ID=33) pg. 32 **Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +27, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +24, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +22 **Str** +8 **Dex** +5 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +4 **Items** _+1 resilient bone armor_ (as [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)), [_greater demon mask_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=430) in the form of a dinosaur-skull helm, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)_ --- **AC** 34 **Fort** +26 **Ref** +23 **Will** +21 **HP** 240 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Death Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 32 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) and [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) for as long as it is sickened; on a critical failure, the creature is instead doomed 2 for as long as it is sickened. While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to any creature's death stench for 1 minute.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _spear_ +27 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 2d6+14 piercing plus drain life and terror master **Melee** claw +26 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 3d6+14 slashing plus drain life and terror master **Melee** jaws +26, **Damage** 3d8+14 piercing plus drain life and terror master **Ranged** _spear_ +24 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d6+14 piercing plus terror master and hungry spear **Drain Life** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When the Raptor Guard wight damages a living creature with a melee Strike, the wight gains 13 temporary Hit Points and the target creature must succeed at a DC 32 Fortitude save or become [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10). Further damage dealt by the wight increases the drained condition by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4. **Hungry Spear** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) The Raptor Guard wight's ranged spear Strikes apply drain life, but the wight doesn't gain any temporary Hit Points if the attack hits. **Terror Master** As long as the Raptor Guard wears its dinosaur-skull helm, its Strikes deal an additional 1d10 negative damage, or an additional 2d10 damage to [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) creatures. **Wight Spawn** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A living [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) slain by a Raptor Guard wight's melee Strike rises as a [wight](/Monsters.aspx?ID=413) after 1d4 rounds. This wight spawn is under the command of the Raptor Guard that killed it. It doesn't have the drain life or wight spawn abilities and is [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3). If the creator of the wight spawn dies, the wight spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous wight; it regains its free will, gains the drain life and wight spawn abilities, and is no longer clumsy.
name: Raptor Guard
